node.text:
Weekends should be all about lazy mornings that translates to waking too late for breakfast but too early for lunch. And then this should automatically translate to a super chill Brunch date at The Raviz Kovalam!

For bookings contact: 0471 – 3051234, 1800-4252-2220
mail: reservations.kovalam@theraviz.com, reservations@theraviz.com
